name: Friends Across Time
description:
After a tragic teleporter accident, a robot-scientist is sent thousands of years into the future. Work together with a friend (local co-op) to solve time-centered puzzles so that he can return home and see his buddy again.

  • Up to 10 minutes of mind-bending puzzle madness.
  • Control one player in the past and one in the future,. Actions in the past have direct consequences on the world in the future.
  • Online multiplayer too convenient and fun? Scared of the corporate overlords' wandering eye? This game supports local co-op only.
  • Made in 48 hours during the first RPI game jam of 2022.

Credits

  • farmerboy101 (programming, art, and game design)
  • Griffin Bates (Chemist02; programming, art, and game design)
  • Adrian Connor (composer)
